类的使用
org.apache.naming.resources.BaseDirContext

  • 使用BaseDirContext的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.naming.resources
    This package contains the resources directory context implementation.

    • org.apache.naming.resources中BaseDirContext的使用

      org.apache.naming.resources中BaseDirContext的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  FileDirContext
      Filesystem Directory Context implementation helper class.
      class  VirtualDirContext
      Extended FileDirContext implementation that allows to expose multiple directories of the filesystem under a single webapp, a feature mainly used for development with IDEs.
      class  WARDirContext
      WAR Directory Context implementation.
      类型参数类型为BaseDirContext的org.apache.naming.resources中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,BaseDirContext> BaseDirContext.aliases
      Aliases allow content to be included from other locations.
      参数类型为BaseDirContext的org.apache.naming.resources中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void BaseDirContext.addAlias(java.lang.String path, BaseDirContext dirContext)
      Add an alias.
